definitions.definition: An ethical drug, one only dispensed on the prescription of a physician.
Of or relating to the study of ethics.
definitions.example: The philosopher Kant is particularly known for his ethical writings.

definitions.definition: Of or relating to the accepted principles of right and wrong, especially those of some organization or profession.
definitions.example: All employees must familiarize themselves with our ethical guidelines.
We are trying to decide what the most ethical course of action would be.

definitions.definition: (of a drug) Only dispensed on the prescription of a physician.
definitions.example: In most jurisdictions, morphine is classified as an ethical drug.
